name: Pet Friends\u2122 Adventures
blurb: Immerse yourself into the creative world of Pet Friends\u2122 Adventures!  \nA fun and educational adventure game for the whole family.

rewards.reward: Do you like what we are doing and want to give a donation to educational children games? Then this is the pledge for you!\r\nYou are a big part of this project and we will listen to all your comments or discussions on the board.  We will then shape the game around what the community has to say!  We will also give you a shout out on Twitter, as a thank you for your support!

You will receive a copy of the Pet Friends\u2122 Adventure Game for the device of your choice when it\u2019s released and have your name placed under the Pet Friends\u2122 Supporters section of the credits!\r\n*The above reward will be received as well.

Your name will be placed at the top of the Pet Friends\u2122 Supporters section of the credits. You will also be able to send us a sentence or quote, that will be placed next to your name! This sentence could be a dedication to your child/sibling, for example \u201cMerry Christmas Bobby!\u201d or \u201cKimmy, this one is for you!\u201d.  *The above rewards will be received as well.
You will receive a Pet Friends\u2122 T Shirt in the size of your choice! (Please add $10 for shipping outside of the U.S.) *All above rewards will be received as well.

You will receive a Pet Friends™Tote Bag to wear and show off! 
You will also recieve PDF’s of all 3 Pet Friends™ activity packets. That’s over 100 pages of activities! These can be used in a classroom or at home to help children (Kindergarten - 3rd grade) learn literacy, math and science, while having a lot of fun! 
(Please add $10 for shipping outside of the U.S.) 
*All above rewards will be received as well.

You will receive the physical softcover book \u201cMy Brother Loves Me\u201d, signed by the wonderful illustrator M.C. Thompson! This book is read by the class in the Pet Friends\u2122 Adventure Game and holding the physical copy will further immerse your child/sibling into their creative world. If you would like us to write something specific after the signature, please specify. (Please add $10 for shipping outside of the U.S.) *All above rewards will be received as well.

You will receive a digital framed print of you, your children/siblings, etc. with the Pet Friends\u2122, signed by the team on the back (we wouldn't want to sign over the photo!). We would need photos and heights of the people you would like us to illustrate with the Pet Friends\u2122. *All above rewards will be received as well.

We will put you or your child/sibling in the game! Watch as the characters in the game say the selected candidate's name throughout the adventure! We will also draw a customized picture of the player and the Pet Friends\u2122. At the end of the adventure, Teacher Winnie will take a picture of the class. The player will see as he/she is inserted straight into the game! You will be able to view the picture in game and a physical framed picture will be sent to you. We would just need a photo and the name of the person to put into the game, as well as their height. *All above rewards will be received as well.

Have a classroom or more than one child/sibling? No problem! We will draw everyone with the Pet Friends\u2122 in the digital picture and send a physical framed copy of that picture to you (multiples can be made as well). We will just need a portrait of everyone that will be in the picture as well as their height. We will also need you to specify the name to say in the game, this can be any word as well. For example, the Pet Friends\u2122 will say \u201cHello (Insert Names or Words here)!\u201d If you wanted more than one name, an example would be \u201cHello Nick and Michelle!\u201d or \u201cHello Ms. Tippett's class!\u201d *All above rewards will be received as well.

Thank you for your massive support! We will put an art piece/drawing that you or your child/sibling creates in the Pet Friends\u2122 Adventures classroom! This picture will be in the actual game for all players to see forever! *All above rewards will be received as well.

Wow! Thank you for your generosity and support for children learning games! We will create a toy, based on a character or image you send us. Players from all over the world and Pet Friends\u2122 will be able to play with this toy in the Pet Friends\u2122 Adventures classroom! This toy could resemble a character you design, you, your child/sibling, you or your child/siblings favorite toy or pet, anything! *All above rewards will be received as well.
